description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Classic minesweeper game play with a twist, you now have the use of a bomb which will safely uncover a large area of the board. Multiple different themes, 4 difficulty levels and custom games, gives an option for everyone while fastest time score boards, game saves and replays will help you increase your skills.
